title: "Clinicians use artificial intelligence to diagnose ear infections more accurately"
excerpt: "A child pulling his or her ear in pain typically results in a parent scheduling a doctor's appointment to check for a medical problem. However, studies have consistently shown that it's a coin toss whether or not a pediatrician or a non-specialist can correctly diagnose an ear infection."
